txt.en:
'Now that you have tried your hand at dealing with the nasty piglets, you should look to the great sire of this family: Big Bloodtusk. He is descended, they say, from an old and grisled boar who wandered into Dunland from the far north and has only been seen by a few people.

'There is a great den near Bloodtusk's Dwelling, and it can only be his, but he is not there often.

'You should lure him there and try to make him attack you. I doubt you will survive, [placeholder], but at least it can be said that you were brave!'

'You! Why are you still alive, [placeholder]? I heard the distant squeals of wild boars engaged in a great battle and assumed you met an untimely end at the tusks of Big Bloodtusk. You certainly smell like a wild pig at the moment, but here you stand.\n\n'Could this mean that you bested him? I suppose you are not so feeble as I presumed, Duvodiad.'
'Why are you still here, [placeholder]? Are you afraid of Big Bloodtusk? I would be too, if I were you. Well, I am pleased to have made your acquaintance. I am sure I will not be seeing you again.'
Many folk in Galtrev have sighted a massive, oversized boar roaming in Pren Gwydh, one that they have named \qBig Bloodtusk\q. Big Bloodtusk is likely the patriarch of Pren Gwydh's vicious boars.
A great rustling and a splash can be heard behind you...look out!
A great rustling and a splash can be heard behind you...look out!
Lure and defeat Big Bloodtusk at his den
Big Bloodtusk's den can be found in Bloodtusk's Dwelling.\n\nYou should lure Big Bloodtusk, the sire of all boars in Pren Gwydh, and attempt to defeat him.
Tell Louri of your victory against Big Bloodtusk
Louri is in Galtrev.\n\nYou should return at once to Louri to let her know that you have accepted her challenge to defeat Big Bloodtusk.
